title: Bronze knife

properties.value: The bronze knife is a throwing knife that does not require a Ranged level to wield. It is the weakest throwing knife in the game. To create bronze knives, the player must have at least 7 Smithing. Each bronze bar will create 5 bronze knives and give the player 12.5 Smithing experience. They can be poisoned and can be wielded with a shield or god book for protection.

The bronze knife is a throwing knife that does not require a Ranged level to wield. It is the weakest throwing knife in the game. To create bronze knives, the player must have at least 7 Smithing. Each bronze bar will create 5 bronze knives and give the player 12.5 Smithing experience. They can be poisoned and can be wielded with a shield or god book for protection.

Throwing knives are among the fastest weapons in the game (along with darts), and are commonly used for PKing or training Ranged. Bronze knives can be purchased from Martin Thwait's Lost and Found shop in the Rogues' Den with 50 Thieving and 50 Agility.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
7 July 2021
(update)

The position of the weapon and its variants on female players has been adjusted so that they appear to be equipped properly.

22 August 2006
(update)
  • The extra strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Bronze knife(+)" to "Bronze knife(p+)".
  • The super strong poisoned variant was renamed from "Bronze knife(s)" to "Bronze knife(p++)".

The '''bronze knife''' is a [[throwing knife]] that does not require a [[Ranged]] level to wield. It is the weakest throwing knife in the game. To create bronze knives, the player must have at least 7 [[Smithing]]. Each [[bronze bar]] will create 5 bronze knives and give the player 12.5 Smithing experience. They can be [[poisoned]] and can be wielded with a [[shield]] or [[god book]] for protection.

Throwing knives are among the fastest weapons in the game (along with [[dart]]s), and are commonly used for [[PKing]] or training Ranged. Bronze knives can be purchased from [[Martin Thwait's Lost and Found]] shop in the [[Rogues' Den]] with 50 [[Thieving]] and 50 [[Agility]].
